annotations.description: How to make the Shrunken Skull, the mid-century tiki cocktail made with Demerara Rum, Dark Cuban-Style Rum, Lime Juice, Grenadine and, optionally, a lime hus...
annotations.title: Shrunken Skull - How to Make an Easy Tiki Drink and the History Behind It

textContent:
1 oz (30ml) Dark Cuban-style Rum
1 oz (30ml) Demerara Rum
1 oz (30ml) Grenadine
1 oz (30ml) Lime Juice
garnish Lime Husk, Pomegranate Seeds (optional)

Shake with ice cubes. Pour unstrained into a skull mug (or double old-fashioned glass). Add garnish and straw.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5TbN5OJOfBg
title: Shrunken Skull
